channel.title: CVE Feed for YITH -- YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YITH -- YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons

item.title: CVE-2023-49777|2024-08-02T22:01:25.864Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20product%20add-ons
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons: from n/a through 4.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-35680|2024-08-02T03:14:53.988Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20product%20add-ons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons allows Code Injection.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons: from n/a through 4.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-27994|2024-06-04T17:46:29.944Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20product%20add-ons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons: from n/a through 4.5.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons allows Code Injection.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons: from n/a through 4.9.2.
